body.name: Sightor Canvas Tote Bag, Multi-Pocket Hobo Bag Crossbody Bag for Women Large Capacity Mommy Bag Canvas Shoulder Bag (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Premium Material】This large capacity tote bag made of high-quality canvas material, strong and durable, simple and fashionable, clear texture, non-fading, soft and comfortable, very easy to clean. Multi-functional pocket bag, can be carried by hand, shoulder and crossbody.

【Product Size】Our canvas totes bag size is 13.78x5.91x9.84inch, and the adjustable and removable shoulder straps length: 26.77-43.31inch, this handbag can be used as a crossbody bag, shoulder bag and a handbag, you can get comfortable whether you choose to carry it over the shoulder or in your hand.

【Multifunctional Structure】This multi pocket tote bag is designed with 5 inner compartments, which are enough to take your phone, tablet, books, water bottle,umbrellas, diapers,etc, it can accommodate up to 13.3-inch laptops. The unique design keep your belongings organized and easy to find. And on the outside of the tote bag with compartments there is 3 front pockets and 3 back pockets, So you can store small items such as power banks, pens and headphones more conveniently.

【Practical Design】Our crossbody tote bag uses removable bottom plate design, which makes cleaning easier, and the bottom plate also acts as a support and anti-fall, no longer to worry about your tablet or mobile phone being bumped, and the handle on the canvas tote bag for women is fitted with a leather fabric loop, more comfortable when carried by hand.

【Wide Range of Uses】This women handbag is extremely practical, Perfect for mommy, professional women, teachers, accountants, nurses, students! Its versatile style easily complements various fashion choices, whether you're heading out for shopping , engaging in outdoor activities, or capturing street-style photos during your travels, this canvas tote bag with pockets is a perfect choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bag appears to be what I was looking for. Have only carried it a couple of times, but it seems to be durable. All the pockets are nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but the pockets aren’t pockets?
reviews.reviewText: The bag is really cute and I like the strap that it comes with a lot. However it was a huge let down because the two middle sections aren’t sewn into the bottom, so if you put something in the middle section, it’ll just migrate to one of the other sections in the bag. It works if you are using it as a book bag I guess, because a book won’t migrate out of it, but I was looking for an every day type of bag and this ain’t it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multifunction canvas tote
reviews.reviewText: I selected this not as a mommy bag, but a tote to organize and carry work items back-and-forth to home and office. This is premium canvas and is extremely well-made and sturdy. There are multiple pockets that can hold a variety of items. The reinforced straps are really nice and the clips that hold them to the bag are very sturdy. The strap is adjustable to achieve your personal comfort. The handles also have a snapped cover to keep them together and provide carrying comfort. I am really impressed with the quality of this tote for the price. It’s perfect as a mommy bag but also perfect for everyday use for school or office. Don’t hesitate, because this is a great bag and a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bummed strap broke

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The measurements listed for the bag I purchased are not accurate or they sent a wrong size. Very disappointed. I rested this so it would be able to carry my computer. Based on the size listed, it should have fit perfectly. I can’t even get it in the pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Strap broke after 2 days use
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bag for an out of town conference. The clasp on the strap broke in the middle of my conference after only being on the second day of use.
